sqlMap.sql: INSERT INTO px_apply_info(itemId, address, `name`, type, mobile, applyId, certificateType, certificateCode, createTime, sourceFrom, organizationName,userId,childName,childBirth,childAge,childSex,addrId,applyItemId,promoterId) values (:itemId, :address, :name, :type, :mobile, :applyId, :certificateType, :certificateCode, :createTime, :sourceFrom, :organizationName, :userId,:childName,:childBirth,:childAge,:childSex,:addrId,:applyItemId,:promoterId)

UPDATE px_apply_info SET address = :address <#if name?exists && name != ""> , `name` = :name </#if> <#if type?exists && type != ""> , type = :type </#if> <#if mobile?exists && mobile != ""> , mobile = :mobile </#if> <#if certificateType?exists && certificateType != ""> , certificateType = :certificateType </#if> <#if certificateCode?exists && certificateCode != ""> , certificateCode = :certificateCode </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> , createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if sourceFrom?exists && sourceFrom != ""> , sourceFrom = :sourceFrom </#if> <#if organizationName?exists && organizationName != ""> , organizationName = :organizationName </#if> <#if status?exists && status != ""> , `status` = :status </#if> <#if userId?exists && userId != ""> , userId = :userId </#if> <#if promoterId?exists && promoterId != ""> , promoterId = :promoterId </#if> WHERE applyId = :applyId

DELETE FROM px_apply_info WHERE 1=1 <#if address?exists && address != ""> AND address = :address </#if> <#if name?exists && name != ""> AND `name` = :name </#if> <#if itemId?exists && itemId != ""> AND `itemId` = :itemId </#if> <#if type?exists && type != ""> AND type = :type </#if> <#if mobile?exists && mobile != ""> AND mobile = :mobile </#if> <#if certificateType?exists && certificateType != ""> AND certificateType = :certificateType </#if> <#if certificateCode?exists && certificateCode != ""> AND certificateCode = :certificateCode </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> AND createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if sourceFrom?exists && sourceFrom != ""> AND sourceFrom = :sourceFrom </#if> <#if organizationName?exists && organizationName != ""> AND organizationName = :organizationName </#if> <#if userId?exists && userId != ""> AND userId = :userId </#if> <#if applyId?exists && applyId != ""> AND applyId = :applyId </#if>

SELECT px_apply_info.address, px_apply_info.itemId, t.title, px_apply_info.`name`, px_apply_info.userId, px_apply_info.type, px_apply_info.mobile, applyId, certificateType, certificateCode, px_apply_info.createTime, sourceFrom, organizationName, px_apply_info.`status`,childName,childBirth,childAge,childSex,addrId,px_apply_info.applyItemId,i.itemName,i.brokerageRate,px_apply_info.promoterId,p.`name` promoter, p.mobile promoterMobile, (select a.addrName from px_study_address a where a.addrId = px_apply_info.addrId) addrName, o.orderNo, w.transaction_id, w.total_fee totalFee FROM px_apply_info INNER JOIN px_training_item t on t.itemId = px_apply_info.itemId LEFT JOIN order_info o on o.businessId = px_apply_info.applyId LEFT JOIN order_weixin w on o.orderNo = w.attach LEFT JOIN px_promoter p on p.promoterId = px_apply_info.promoterId LEFT JOIN px_apply_item i on i.applyItemId = px_apply_info.applyItemId WHERE 1=1 <#if orderNo?exists && orderNo != ""> AND orderNo = :orderNo </#if> <#if transactionId?exists && transactionId != ""> AND transaction_id = :transactionId </#if> <#if address?exists && address != ""> AND px_apply_info.address = :address </#if> <#if name?exists && name != ""> AND px_apply_info.`name` = :name </#if> <#if type?exists && type != ""> AND px_apply_info.type = :type </#if> <#if userId?exists && userId != ""> AND px_apply_info.userId = :userId </#if> <#if promoterId?exists && promoterId != ""> AND px_apply_info.promoterId = :promoterId </#if> <#if mobile?exists && mobile != ""> AND px_apply_info.mobile = :mobile </#if> <#if certificateType?exists && certificateType != ""> AND certificateType = :certificateType </#if> <#if certificateCode?exists && certificateCode != ""> AND certificateCode = :certificateCode </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> AND createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if sourceFrom?exists && sourceFrom != ""> AND sourceFrom = :sourceFrom </#if> <#if organizationName?exists && organizationName != ""> AND organizationName = :organizationName </#if> <#if status?exists && status != ""> AND px_apply_info.`status` = :status </#if> <#if applyId?exists && applyId != ""> AND applyId = :applyId </#if> <#if itemId?exists && itemId != ""> AND px_apply_info.itemId = :itemId </#if> <#if orderBy?exists && orderBy !="" > ORDER BY :orderBy <#if orderType?exists && orderType !="" > :orderType </#if> </#if> <#if startIndex?exists && startIndex !="" && maxCount?exists && maxCount !="" > LIMIT :startIndex,:maxCount </#if>

select sum(o.totalMoney * i.brokerageRate) money, max(a.createTime) time FROM px_apply_info a INNER JOIN order_info o on o.businessId = a.applyId INNER JOIN px_apply_item i on i.applyItemId = a.applyItemId where a.`status` = 2 and a.promoterId = :promoterId and a.createTime > :beginDatePoint

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM px_apply_info INNER JOIN px_training_item t on t.itemId = px_apply_info.itemId LEFT JOIN order_info o on o.businessId = px_apply_info.applyId LEFT JOIN order_weixin w on o.orderNo = w.attach LEFT JOIN px_promoter p on p.promoterId = px_apply_info.promoterId LEFT JOIN px_apply_item i on i.applyItemId = px_apply_info.applyItemId WHERE 1=1 <#if orderNo?exists && orderNo != ""> AND orderNo = :orderNo </#if> <#if transactionId?exists && transactionId != ""> AND transaction_id = :transactionId </#if> <#if address?exists && address != ""> AND px_apply_info.address = :address </#if> <#if name?exists && name != ""> AND px_apply_info.`name` = :name </#if> <#if type?exists && type != ""> AND px_apply_info.type = :type </#if> <#if mobile?exists && mobile != ""> AND px_apply_info.mobile = :mobile </#if> <#if userId?exists && userId != ""> AND px_apply_info.userId = :userId </#if> <#if certificateType?exists && certificateType != ""> AND certificateType = :certificateType </#if> <#if certificateCode?exists && certificateCode != ""> AND certificateCode = :certificateCode </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> AND createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if sourceFrom?exists && sourceFrom != ""> AND sourceFrom = :sourceFrom </#if> <#if organizationName?exists && organizationName != ""> AND organizationName = :organizationName </#if> <#if status?exists && status != ""> AND px_apply_info.`status` = :status </#if> <#if applyId?exists && applyId != ""> AND applyId = :applyId </#if> <#if itemId?exists && itemId != ""> AND px_apply_info.itemId = :itemId </#if> <#if promoterId?exists && promoterId != ""> AND px_apply_info.promoterId = :promoterId </#if> <#if orderBy?exists && orderBy !="" > ORDER BY :orderBy <#if orderType?exists && orderType !="" > :orderType </#if> </#if>

SELECT address, `name`, type, mobile, userId, applyId, certificateType, certificateCode, createTime, sourceFrom, organizationName, status, itemId FROM px_apply_info WHERE 1=1 <#if address?exists && address != ""> AND address = :address </#if> <#if name?exists && name != ""> AND `name` = :name </#if> <#if userId?exists && userId != ""> AND `userId` = :userId </#if> <#if type?exists && type != ""> AND type = :type </#if> <#if mobile?exists && mobile != ""> AND mobile = :mobile </#if> <#if certificateType?exists && certificateType != ""> AND certificateType = :certificateType </#if> <#if certificateCode?exists && certificateCode != ""> AND certificateCode = :certificateCode </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> AND createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if sourceFrom?exists && sourceFrom != ""> AND sourceFrom = :sourceFrom </#if> <#if organizationName?exists && organizationName != ""> AND organizationName = :organizationName </#if> <#if status?exists && status != ""> AND status = :status </#if> <#if applyId?exists && applyId != ""> AND applyId = :applyId </#if> <#if itemId?exists && itemId != ""> AND itemId = :itemId </#if> <#if orderBy?exists && orderBy!="" && orderType?exists> ORDER BY :orderBy :orderType </#if> <#if startIndex?exists && startIndex !="" && maxCount?exists && maxCount !="" > LIMIT :startIndex,:maxCount </#if>

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM px_apply_info WHERE 1=1 <#if address?exists && address != ""> AND address = :address </#if> <#if name?exists && name != ""> AND `name` = :name </#if> <#if type?exists && type != ""> AND type = :type </#if> <#if userId?exists && userId != ""> AND userId = :userId </#if> <#if mobile?exists && mobile != ""> AND mobile = :mobile </#if> <#if certificateType?exists && certificateType != ""> AND certificateType = :certificateType </#if> <#if certificateCode?exists && certificateCode != ""> AND certificateCode = :certificateCode </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> AND createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if sourceFrom?exists && sourceFrom != ""> AND sourceFrom = :sourceFrom </#if> <#if organizationName?exists && organizationName != ""> AND organizationName = :organizationName </#if> <#if status?exists && status != ""> AND status = :status </#if> <#if applyId?exists && applyId != ""> AND applyId = :applyId </#if> <#if itemId?exists && itemId != ""> AND itemId = :itemId </#if> <#if orderBy?exists && orderBy!="" && orderType?exists> ORDER BY :orderBy :orderType </#if>
